name: antimage_mana_break
info: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

name: antimage_blink
info: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

name: antimage_spell_shield
info: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.

name: antimage_mana_void
info: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.

name: axe_berserkers_call
info: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

name: axe_battle_hunger
info: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger

name: axe_counter_helix
info: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.

name: axe_culling_blade
info: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

name: bane_enfeeble
info: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage. Lasts 20 seconds.

name: bane_brain_sap
info: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

name: bane_fiends_grip
info: Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.

name: bane_nightmare
info: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second. Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.

name: bloodseeker_bloodrage
info: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.

name: bloodseeker_blood_bath
info: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

name: bloodseeker_thirst
info: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.
Damage: Max Move Speed Bonus per Hero: 16%/24%/32%/40%

name: bloodseeker_rupture
info: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage. The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

name: drow_ranger_frost_arrows
info: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement. Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

name: drow_ranger_wave_of_silence
info: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

name: drow_ranger_trueshot
info: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units on the map based on a percentage of Drow's agility. Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
Damage: Agility as Ranged Attack Damage Bonus: 20%/26%/32%/38%

name: drow_ranger_marksmanship
info: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.

name: earthshaker_fissure
info: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

name: earthshaker_enchant_totem
info: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.

name: earthshaker_aftershock
info: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

name: earthshaker_echo_slam
info: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

name: juggernaut_blade_dance
info: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

name: juggernaut_blade_fury
info: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Lasts 5 seconds.

name: juggernaut_healing_ward
info: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.

name: juggernaut_omni_slash
info: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

name: kunkka_torrent
info: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

name: kunkka_tidebringer
info: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

name: kunkka_x_marks_the_spot
info: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds. Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

name: kunkka_return
info: Returns the marked hero to the X.
Damage: Replaces X Marks the Spotâ€‹ until the X disappears on the target.

name: kunkka_ghostship
info: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

name: lina_dragon_slave
info: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

name: lina_light_strike_array
info: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

name: lina_fiery_soul
info: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: lina_laguna_blade
info: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

name: lion_impale
info: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

name: lion_voodoo
info: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

name: lion_mana_drain
info: Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

name: lion_finger_of_death
info: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

name: mirana_arrow
info: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

name: mirana_invis
info: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

name: mirana_leap
info: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.

name: mirana_starfall
info: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.

name: morphling_waveform
info: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

name: morphling_adaptive_strike
info: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's Agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's Agility is 50% higher than Strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his Strength is 50% higher than his Agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.

name: morphling_morph_agi
info: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible. Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change. Passively grants bonus Agility.

name: morphling_morph_str
info: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible. Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change. Passively grants bonus Strength.

name: morphling_replicate
info: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing 80% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100% of any incoming damage. At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire.

name: morphling_morph_replicate
info: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.

name: nevermore_shadowraze1
info: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

name: nevermore_shadowraze2
info: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

name: nevermore_shadowraze3
info: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

name: nevermore_necromastery
info: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls. On death, he releases half of them from bondage.

name: nevermore_dark_lord
info: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

name: nevermore_requiem
info: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

name: phantom_lancer_spirit_lance
info: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

name: phantom_lancer_doppelwalk
info: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600% damage and deals 20% damage.

name: phantom_lancer_juxtapose
info: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

name: phantom_lancer_phantom_edge
info: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

name: puck_illusory_orb
info: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

name: puck_ethereal_jaunt
info: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

name: puck_waning_rift
info: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

name: puck_phase_shift
info: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

name: puck_dream_coil
info: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

name: pudge_flesh_heap
info: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity. Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

name: pudge_meat_hook
info: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.

name: pudge_rot
info: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

name: pudge_dismember
info: Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

name: shadow_shaman_ether_shock
info: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

name: shadow_shaman_voodoo
info: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

name: shadow_shaman_shackles
info: Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

name: shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward
info: Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage. It takes two hits to destroy a single ward.

name: razor_plasma_field
info: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.

name: razor_static_link
info: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

name: razor_unstable_current
info: Razor moves with increased speed, and any abilities targeted at him are instantly countered with a jolt of electricity which damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.

name: razor_eye_of_the_storm
info: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

name: skeleton_king_hellfire_blast
info: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

name: skeleton_king_vampiric_aura
info: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

name: skeleton_king_mortal_strike
info: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.

name: skeleton_king_reincarnation
info: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

name: death_prophet_carrion_swarm
info: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

name: death_prophet_silence
info: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

name: death_prophet_witchcraft
info: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining max health per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed.Max Health Drain per Second: 1%/2.5%/4%/5.5%

name: death_prophet_exorcism
info: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts 35 seconds.

name: sven_storm_bolt
info: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

name: sven_great_cleave
info: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

name: sven_warcry
info: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: sven_gods_strength
info: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.

name: storm_spirit_static_remnant
info: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

name: storm_spirit_electric_vortex
info: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.

name: storm_spirit_overload
info: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

name: storm_spirit_ball_lightning
info: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

name: sandking_burrowstrike
info: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

name: sandking_sand_storm
info: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

name: sandking_caustic_finale
info: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals 50% damage if its timer expires.

name: sandking_epicenter
info: After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

name: tiny_avalanche
info: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

name: tiny_toss
info: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land. If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.

name: tiny_craggy_exterior
info: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers. Enemies that attack Tiny from within 300 units have a chance of being stunned.

name: tiny_grow
info: Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed.

name: zuus_arc_lightning
info:
Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
 bounces: 5/7/9/15

name: zuus_lightning_bolt
info: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.

name: zuus_static_field
info: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

name: zuus_thundergods_wrath
info: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

name: slardar_sprint
info: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.

name: slardar_slithereen_crush
info: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units. After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

name: slardar_bash
info: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy. The duration is doubled against creeps.

name: slardar_amplify_damage
info: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

name: tidehunter_gush
info: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 4 seconds.

name: tidehunter_kraken_shell
info: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold. Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

name: tidehunter_anchor_smash
info: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

name: tidehunter_ravage
info: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

name: vengefulspirit_magic_missile
info: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

name: vengefulspirit_command_aura
info: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

name: vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror
info: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.

name: vengefulspirit_nether_swap
info: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.

name: crystal_maiden_crystal_nova
info: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

name: crystal_maiden_frostbite
info: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing 50 damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

name: crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura
info: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field
info: Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: windrunner_shackleshot
info: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

name: windrunner_powershot
info: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 10%.

name: windrunner_windrun
info: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

name: windrunner_focusfire
info: Windranger channels the wind to gain 500 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced. Lasts 20 seconds.

name: lich_frost_nova
info: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds. The primary target takes the most damage.

name: lich_frost_armor
info: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

name: lich_dark_ritual
info: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.

name: lich_chain_frost
info: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. The first target is mini-stunned.

name: witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask
info: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

name: witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration
info: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

name: witch_doctor_maledict
info: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

name: witch_doctor_death_ward
info: Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within 700 range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.

name: riki_smoke_screen
info: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.

name: riki_blink_strike
info: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

name: riki_backstab
info: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

name: riki_permanent_invisibility
info: Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a 500 radius once per second

name: enigma_malefice
info: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances. An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

name: enigma_demonic_conversion
info: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply. When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

name: enigma_midnight_pulse
info: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

name: enigma_black_hole
info: Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

name: tinker_laser
info: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.

name: tinker_heat_seeking_missile
info: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range.

name: tinker_march_of_the_machines
info: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

name: tinker_rearm
info: Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

name: sniper_shrapnel
info: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 55 seconds.

name: sniper_headshot
info: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies

name: sniper_take_aim
info: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

name: sniper_assassinate
info: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

name: necrolyte_death_pulse
info: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

name: necrolyte_heartstopper_aura
info: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

name: necrolyte_sadist
info: Necrophos gains health and mana regeneration for killing units. Hero Kills give 10 times the bonus.

name: necrolyte_reapers_scythe
info: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 10/20/30 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

name: warlock_fatal_bonds
info: Binds several enemy units together, causing 25% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

name: warlock_shadow_word
info: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

name: warlock_upheaval
info: A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

name: warlock_rain_of_chaos
info: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack

name: beastmaster_wild_axes
info: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild
info: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar
info: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.

name: beastmaster_inner_beast
info: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

name: beastmaster_primal_roar
info: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed.

name: queenofpain_shadow_strike
info: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds. An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

name: queenofpain_blink
info: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat

name: queenofpain_scream_of_pain
info: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

name: queenofpain_sonic_wave
info: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.

name: venomancer_venomous_gale
info: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

name: venomancer_poison_sting
info: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage

name: venomancer_plague_ward
info: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer. Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

name: venomancer_poison_nova
info: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer. Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

name: faceless_void_time_walk
info: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken in the last 2 seconds.

name: faceless_void_backtrack
info: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 10% for each cooldown frozen.

name: faceless_void_time_lock
info: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

name: faceless_void_chronosphere
info: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected. Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

name: pugna_nether_blast
info: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area. Deals half damage to structures,

name: pugna_decrepify
info: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take etra magic damage.

name: pugna_nether_ward
info: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: pugna_life_drain
info: When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead. When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

name: phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger
info: Throws a dagger, doing damage and slowing the enemy unit's movementspeed.

name: phantom_assassin_phantom_strike
info: Teleports to a unit, frienly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

name: phantom_assassin_blur
info: Increasing Phantom Assassin's ability to evade enemy attack,and her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.

name: phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace
info: Phantom Assassin gains a chance to delivering a devastating critical strike on enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

name: templar_assassin_refraction
info: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

name: templar_assassin_meld
info: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 10 seconds.

name: templar_assassin_psi_blades
info: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range

name: templar_assassin_psionic_trap
info: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5% every second, up to 50%.

name: templar_assassin_trap
info: Spring the nearest trap, slowing nerby enemies.

name: viper_poison_attack
info: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

name: viper_nethertoxin
info: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing. The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target. Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.

name: viper_corrosive_skin
info: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

name: viper_viper_strike
info: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

name: luna_lucent_beam
info: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

name: luna_moon_glaive
info: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

name: luna_lunar_blessing
info: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.

name: luna_eclipse
info: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.

name: dragon_knight_breathe_fire
info: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

name: dragon_knight_dragon_tail
info: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

name: dragon_knight_dragon_blood
info: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

name: dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form
info: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.

name: dazzle_poison_touch
info: Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, gradually slowing movement, and causing damage over time.

name: dazzle_shallow_grave
info: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.

name: dazzle_shadow_wave
info: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby. Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

name: dazzle_weave
info: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over 24 seconds.

name: rattletrap_battery_assault
info: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

name: rattletrap_power_cogs
info: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down. Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

name: rattletrap_rocket_flare
info: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

name: rattletrap_hookshot
info: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

name: leshrac_split_earth
info: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

name: leshrac_diabolic_edict
info: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures. The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Deals 40% more damage to towers. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: leshrac_lightning_storm
info: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then jumps to nearby enemy units. Struck units are slowed by 75% for a duration.

name: leshrac_pulse_nova
info: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

name: furion_sprout
info: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

name: furion_teleportation
info: Teleports to any point on the map.

name: furion_force_of_nature
info: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 health, deal 30-34 damage and lives for 60 seconds.

name: furion_wrath_of_nature
info: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Damage Increment per Bounce is 7% and number of bounces is 16.

name: life_stealer_rage
info: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage and gaining increased attack speed.

name: life_stealer_feast
info: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

name: life_stealer_open_wounds
info: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

name: life_stealer_infest
info: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health. Does not work on enemy heroes.

name: life_stealer_consume
info: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

name: dark_seer_vacuum
info: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

name: dark_seer_ion_shell
info: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

name: dark_seer_surge
info: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.

name: dark_seer_wall_of_replica
info: Raises a wall of warping light that damages and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

name: clinkz_strafe
info: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows. Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

name: clinkz_searing_arrows
info: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

name: clinkz_wind_walk
info: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

name: clinkz_death_pact
info: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hit points as max health and damage.
Damage: Target's Current Health as Attack Damage Bonus: 5%/6.5%/8%

name: omniknight_purification
info: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

name: omniknight_repel
info: Creates a divine barrier around a target unit which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.

name: omniknight_degen_aura
info: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

name: omniknight_guardian_angel
info: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.

name: enchantress_untouchable
info: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

name: enchantress_enchant
info: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.

name: enchantress_natures_attendants
info: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Heals 10 hp per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: enchantress_impetus
info: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is. The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

name: huskar_inner_vitality
info: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster. Lasts 16 seconds.
Damage: Main Attribute as Regen below Threshold: 20%/40%/60%/80%

name: huskar_burning_spear
info: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack. Multiple attacks will stack additional damage. Each attack drains some of Huskar's health. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: huskar_berserkers_blood
info: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

name: huskar_life_break
info: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them. While leaping, Huskar is spell immune.

name: night_stalker_void
info: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

name: night_stalker_crippling_fear
info: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced. The effect lasts longer at night.

name: night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night
info: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

name: night_stalker_darkness
info: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to 675.

name: broodmother_spawn_spiderlings
info: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

name: broodmother_spin_web
info: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 40 seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for 6 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

name: broodmother_incapacitating_bite
info: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

name: broodmother_insatiable_hunger
info: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

name: bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss
info: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target. The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.

name: bounty_hunter_jinada
info: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

name: bounty_hunter_wind_walk
info: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

name: bounty_hunter_track
info: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.

name: weaver_the_swarm
info: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

name: weaver_shukuchi
info: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

name: weaver_geminate_attack
info: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

name: weaver_time_lapse
info: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

name: jakiro_dual_breath
info: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

name: jakiro_ice_path
info: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

name: jakiro_liquid_fire
info: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

name: jakiro_macropyre
info: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

name: batrider_sticky_napalm
info: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks. The extra damage is halved against creeps.

name: batrider_flamebreak
info: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

name: batrider_firefly
info: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air. The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.

name: batrider_flaming_lasso
info: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities. Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

name: chen_penitence
info: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

name: chen_test_of_faith
info: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

name: chen_test_of_faith_teleport
info: Teleports an allied unit back to the base. Creeps are teleported instantly, while heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.

name: chen_holy_persuasion
info: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.

name: chen_hand_of_god
info: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

name: spectre_spectral_dagger
info: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

name: spectre_desolate
info: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy who is alone.

name: spectre_dispersion
info: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

name: spectre_haunt
info: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt. Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.

name: spectre_reality
info: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.

name: doom_bringer_devour
info: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.

name: doom_bringer_scorched_earth
info: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

name: doom_bringer_lvl_death
info: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.3 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals 25/30/35/40 + 1.3/2.5/3.8/5% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

name: doom_bringer_doom
info: Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

name: ancient_apparition_cold_feet
info: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point. If the enemy unit doesn't move out of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

name: ancient_apparition_ice_vortex
info: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range. Lasts 16 seconds.

name: ancient_apparition_chilling_touch
info: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly. Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: ancient_apparition_ice_blast
info: Launches a tracer towards any location of the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touched the icy ball of hail as it travels, are frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

name: ancient_apparition_ice_blast_release
info: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.

name: spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness
info: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects. All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash. If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

name: spirit_breaker_empowering_haste
info: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for 6 seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.

name: spirit_breaker_greater_bash
info: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

name: spirit_breaker_nether_strike
info: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.

name: ursa_earthshock
info: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

name: ursa_overpower
info: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

name: ursa_fury_swipes
info: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 20 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

name: ursa_enrage
info: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.

name: gyrocopter_rocket_barrage
info: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter. Lasts 3 seconds.

name: gyrocopter_homing_missile
info: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

name: gyrocopter_flak_cannon
info: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks. Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike. Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

name: gyrocopter_call_down
info: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.

name: alchemist_acid_spray
info: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

name: alchemist_unstable_concoction
info: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

name: alchemist_unstable_concoction_throw
info: Throw it before it blows up!

name: alchemist_goblins_greed
info: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 30 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield 3/4/5/6 times their normal gold.

name: alchemist_chemical_rage
info: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.

name: invoker_quas
info: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.

name: invoker_wex
info: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

name: invoker_exort
info: Allows manipulation of fire elements and grants a permanent intelligence bonus. Each Exort instance provides increased attack damage.

name: invoker_invoke
info: Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

name: invoker_cold_snap
info: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of Quas. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of Quas.

name: invoker_ghost_walk
info: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of Wex.

name: invoker_tornado
info: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of Wex. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of Quas. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in Wex.

name: invoker_emp
info: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after 2.9 seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of Wex. Deals damage for each point of mana drained. If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.

name: invoker_alacrity
info: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of Wex and their damage based on the level of Exort.

name: invoker_chaos_meteor
info: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of Exort, and rolling further based on the level of Wex. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of Exort.

name: invoker_sun_strike
info: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of Exort, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

name: invoker_forge_spirit
info: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage, mana, and armor are based on the level of Exort while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of Quas. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. If both Quas and Exort are level 4 or higher, Invoker will create two spirits instead of one.

name: invoker_ice_wall
info: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of Quas. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas and deals damage each second based on the level of Exort.

name: invoker_deafening_blast
info: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of Exort. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of Quas, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of Wex. If Quas, Wex, and Exort are all at max level, Deafening Blast becomes a non-targetable circular wave released in every direction around Invoker.

name: silencer_curse_of_the_silent
info: Silencer will permanently steal 2 intelligence from any enemy hero that dies within 925 range or is killed by the Silencer.

name: silencer_glaives_of_wisdom
info: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.

name: silencer_last_word
info: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.

name: silencer_global_silence
info: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

name: obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb
info: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals 1/2/3/4 intelligence for 80 seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.

name: obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment
info: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals 100/175/250/325 damage to enemies in a 400 radius around the target.

name: obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura
info: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool. Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool. Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.

name: obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse
info: Unleashes a psychic blast that removes 40% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy has the same or higher intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.

name: lycan_summon_wolves
info: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan. Level 2-4 wolves have Cripple, level 3-4 wolves have permanent invisibility, and level 4 wolves have 15 HP regen.

name: lycan_howl
info: Grants bonus damage to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control.

name: lycan_feral_impulse
info: Increases the damage and attack speed of Lycan and all units under his control.

name: lycan_shapeshift
info: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing 140%/160%/180% damage.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear
info: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items. If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack. Lone Druid suffers 10% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.

name: lone_druid_rabid
info: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.

name: lone_druid_synergy
info: Lone Druid roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.

name: lone_druid_true_form
info: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability. He can morph freely between druid and bear form.

name: lone_druid_true_form_druid
info: Return to Druid form.

name: lone_druid_true_form_battle_cry
info: Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.

name: brewmaster_thunder_clap
info: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

name: brewmaster_drunken_haze
info: Drenches a small area in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

name: brewmaster_drunken_brawler
info: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.

name: brewmaster_primal_split
info: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

name: shadow_demon_disruption
info: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration. Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

name: shadow_demon_soul_catcher
info: Curses a random enemy in an area to take increased damage. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.

name: shadow_demon_shadow_poison
info: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each. This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

name: shadow_demon_shadow_poison_release
info: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.

name: shadow_demon_demonic_purge
info: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration. The unit slowly regains its movement speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

name: chaos_knight_chaos_bolt
info: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

name: chaos_knight_reality_rift
info: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.

name: chaos_knight_chaos_strike
info: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage and reduce the target's armor by 5 for 8 seconds.

name: chaos_knight_phantasm
info: Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal full damage, but take double damage.

name: meepo_earthbind
info: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units. Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.

name: meepo_poof
info: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.

name: meepo_geostrike
info: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit. Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.

name: meepo_divided_we_stand
info: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears. If any of the clones die, they all die.

name: treant_natures_guise
info: Causes the targeted unit to blend in with the forest, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining a movement speed bonus when near a tree. If the unit moves away from a tree or the spell is cast on a unit with no nearby trees, Nature's Guise is lost. Treant Protector can cast spells and remain invisible under Nature's Guise.

name: treant_leech_seed
info: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it. Pulses 6 times.

name: treant_living_armor
info: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

name: treant_overgrowth
info: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

name: ogre_magi_fireblast
info: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

name: ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast
info: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 60% of the hero's current mana.

name: ogre_magi_ignite
info: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

name: ogre_magi_bloodlust
info: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.

name: ogre_magi_multicast
info: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his spells multiple times with each use, while also granting his spells greater potency: Fireblast has its cooldown decreased and its mana cost increased. Ignite hits enemies in an area, its range is increased, and it may be cast onto random nearby enemies when used. Bloodlust has its cooldown reduced, and may be cast on random nearby allies when used.

name: undying_decay
info: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.

name: undying_soul_rip
info: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

name: undying_tombstone
info: Summons a tombstone at the target point. Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them. Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

name: undying_flesh_golem
info: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura. This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow. When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.

name: rubick_telekinesis
info: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

name: rubick_telekinesis_land
info: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.

name: rubick_fade_bolt
info: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.

name: rubick_null_field
info: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.

name: rubick_spell_steal
info: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

name: disruptor_thunder_strike
info: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning. Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius. Provides vision of its target.

name: disruptor_glimpse
info: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago. Instantly kills illusions.

name: disruptor_kinetic_field
info: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

name: disruptor_static_storm
info: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

name: nyx_assassin_impale
info: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

name: nyx_assassin_mana_burn
info: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

name: nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace
info: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility. While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

name: nyx_assassin_vendetta
info: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus. If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

name: naga_siren_mirror_image
info: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.

name: naga_siren_ensnare
info: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

name: naga_siren_rip_tide
info: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

name: naga_siren_song_of_the_siren
info: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

name: naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_cancel
info: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.

name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate
info: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled. Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path. The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

name: keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak
info: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move. If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.

name: keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic
info: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form
info: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities. Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.

name: keeper_of_the_light_recall
info: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location. If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

name: keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light
info: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.

name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate_end
info: Release the channel early.

name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illuminate
info: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled. Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path. The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illuminate_end
info: Release the channel early.

name: visage_grave_chill
info: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

name: visage_soul_assumption
info: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 110 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

name: visage_gravekeepers_cloak
info: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from physical and magical attacks. If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

name: visage_summon_familiars
info: Conjures up two blind Familiars to fight for Visage. Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time. Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing. While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health and damage. Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

name: wisp_tether
info: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.

name: wisp_spirits
info: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it. Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode. When its duration ends, any remaining spirits explode.

name: wisp_overcharge
info: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second. If Io is tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.

name: wisp_relocate
info: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

name: wisp_tether_break
info: Break the link to the tethered unit.
Damage: Replaces Tether icon.png Tetherâ€‹ until the Tether is broken.

name: wisp_spirits_in
info: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

name: wisp_spirits_out
info: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

name: slark_dark_pact
info: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself. Slark only takes 50% of the damage.

name: slark_pounce
info: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with. That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

name: slark_essence_shift
info: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.

name: slark_shadow_dance
info: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark. Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

name: medusa_split_shot
info: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage. The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: medusa_mystic_snake
info: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.

name: medusa_mana_shield
info: Creates a shield that absorbs 60% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.

name: medusa_stone_gaze
info: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone. Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage. If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.

name: troll_warlord_berserkers_rage
info: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and stunning the target. Berserker's Rage also grants movement speed, armor, and increased attack speed. Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.

name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged
info: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_melee
info: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

name: troll_warlord_fervor
